title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-3.2 - Agenda for authority meetings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-3.2 - Agenda for authority meetings

State Regulations

An agenda of business to be acted on should be prepared
for each meeting by the secretary or other designated individuals. Members
should receive a copy of the agenda a day or two prior to the meeting so they
may prepare for the business to be transacted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
